short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your attendance viewing experience and determine how many days you need to attend ;)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Attendance-Bot! This powerful tool is designed to make tracking your attendance and taking planned study leaves at school a breeze.

Simply install the extension and log in to your SAP portal account. Attendance-Bot will automatically retrieve your attendance data, perform the necessary operations and display all the information right there on the website. No need to click buttons and 𝗻𝗼 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗰𝘂𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗼𝗿 𝗴𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘀𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗱𝗲𝗱!

Attendance-Bot is a must-have tool for students, employees, and anyone else who needs to keep track of their attendance. 

Install Attendance-Bot today and take the hassle out of attendance tracking !
